item.title: 2.2 Connecting to the OCI Console
item.description: 2.2 Connecting to the OCI Console Method #1. Connect via Welcome Email 1 . When you receive your Free Tier Account ready mail, click Sign in to Oracle Cloud to connect to OCI Cloud Console. On the login screen, enter the administrator email and password you entered when you applied for Free Tier to log in. Login successful Method #2. Connect directly to your browser Connect to https://cloud.

item.title: 2.3 Using the OCI Console
item.description: 2.3 Using the OCI Console OCI Console UI Service Navigation You can work with services and resources through the navigation menus in the upper left corner. Region Administration Your current Region is displayed in the upper right, and if you subscribe to and use multiple Regions, you can switch to a different Region from that menu. In addition, if you want to subscribe to another Region, you can subscribe through the Region Admin menu in the submenu.
